video.title: La Usurpadora
video.synopsis: Two women who meet by chance are surprised by how much they resemble each other and set out to find out if they're sisters.

episodes.synopsis: In the Martinez family restaurant, a sick Paola dismisses her daughter, Paulina, and tells her she wants her to marry her boyfriend, Osvaldo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 1

episodes.synopsis: Paola agrees to pay Paulina if she impersonates her with Osvaldo. Rodrigo tells Carlos Daniel the business is bankrupt from lack of sales.
episodes.title: Capítulo 2

episodes.synopsis: Paola tells the boss she won't denounce Paulina. Paola talks to Paulina and threatens to do so if Paulina won't take her place in the Bracho home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 3

episodes.synopsis: Willy asks Paola why she's changed. Estefanía warns Paola that Gema is after Carlos Daniel. Leandro threatens a strike.
episodes.title: Capítulo 4

episodes.synopsis: Donato tells Félix Paola is behaving strangely and warns not to double-cross him. Paulina remembers Paola warned her she could fall for Carlos Daniel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 5

episodes.synopsis: Paola wants Carlos Daniel to believe she's changed. She sends gifts to the servants surprising Fidelina. She tells Alessandro she fears for her life.
episodes.title: Capítulo 6

episodes.synopsis: Paola tells Donato that her mole was removed and that she wants to break up because she's ill. Donato believes she's trying to take over the company.
episodes.title: Capítulo 7

episodes.synopsis: Paola tells Rodrigo and Carlos Daniel she's visiting the factory. She asks Leandro to tell the workers she'll do everything to keep the factory open.
episodes.title: Capítulo 8

episodes.synopsis: Grandma Piedad tells Fidelina that Paola will turn the factory around. Estefanía warns Fidelina if she takes Paola's side she'll hate her too.
episodes.title: Capítulo 9

episodes.synopsis: Donato tells Paola that she must see him. Doctor Petit tells Alessandro Paola needs a risky operation that could kill her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 10

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel asks Gema not to try to seduce him. Estefania accuses Paola of beating Carlitos. Carlos Daniel tells Paola to do whatever's necessary.
episodes.title: Capítulo 11

episodes.synopsis: Paulina thinks she's in love with Carlos Daniel. Lalita tells Paola Gema kissed Carlos Daniel. Grandma Piedad tells Panchito Paola's secret.
episodes.title: Capítulo 12

episodes.synopsis: Estefania tells Donato where Carlos Daniel is. Gema and Carlos Daniel plan to make Paola jealous. Grandma Piedad won't give Estefania her inheritance.
episodes.title: Capítulo 13

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel thinks Paola is jealous because he's paying attention to Gema. Paola asks Estefania to accept her as a friend.
episodes.title: Capítulo 14

episodes.synopsis: Gema tells Luciano she'll pay him any amount if he can make Paola fall in love with him. At Carlos Daniel's birthday party, Gema introduces Luciano.
episodes.title: Capítulo 15

episodes.synopsis: Douglas tells Braulio he agreed to talk to Paola because she reminds him of a woman he once loved. Grandma Piedad suspects Paola has a usurping twin.
episodes.title: Capítulo 16

episodes.synopsis: Douglas orders Mr. Maldonado to make a deposit for the Brachos. Paulina receives a telegram from Paola announcing she's about to return.
episodes.title: Capítulo 17

episodes.synopsis: Paulina tells Luciano she might tell Carlos Daniel his secret, since he won't give her money. Carlos Daniel tells Gema he'll never divorce Paola.
episodes.title: Capítulo 18

episodes.synopsis: Luciano tells Gema to forget about Carlos Daniel. Carlos Daniel asks where the mole Paola had on her back went, and when she learned to swim.
episodes.title: Capítulo 19

episodes.synopsis: Paola asks Paulina to forge her signature for the bank paperwork. Moises tells Eusebio Carlitos is unconscious after falling off a horse.
episodes.title: Capítulo 20

episodes.synopsis: Paola tells Grandma Piedad Carlitos came out of the operation OK. Willy tells Viviana he'll get a divorce to marry her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 21

episodes.synopsis: Carlitos is mad that Dr. Barragan made him use crutches. To get back at Willy for rejecting her, Estela gives Estefania a note from Willy to Viviana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 22

episodes.synopsis: Paola asks Donato to leave her alone, and she'll find him to tell him the truth. Paola slaps Willy for saying Leandro could be her new lover.
episodes.title: Capítulo 23

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Leuvano tells Paola one of the checks was issued in Acapulco, and her signature doesn't match on another. Estefania asks Estela to watch Willy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 24

episodes.synopsis: Estefania tells Paola she agrees to change ehr look, but she'll be sorry if she laughs at her. Paulina is sad to think she can't love.
episodes.title: Capítulo 25

episodes.synopsis: Alessandro tells Luciano Paola died in the accident. Paulina explains to Donato how Paola planned the usurpation.
episodes.title: Capítulo 26

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo tells Patricia he'll go back to the house but no to the factory. Grandma Piedad tells Fidelina Carlos Daniel may divorce Paola for Veronica.
episodes.title: Capítulo 27

episodes.synopsis: Paulina tells Luciano Paola isn't dead. Gema threatens Veronica to back off of Carlos Daniel. Douglas writes to Paola saying he'll return to Mexico.
episodes.title: Capítulo 28

episodes.synopsis: Paola offers to be a bridesmaid at Leandro and Viviana's wedding. Gema tells Carlos Daniel the anonymous letter must be from an ex-lover of Paola's.
episodes.title: Capítulo 29

episodes.synopsis: Grandma Piedad tells Panchito about Rodrigo's suspicion, and that Paola will find out. Douglas tells Braulio he investigated Paola and she's easy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 30

episodes.synopsis: Luciano tells Carlos Daniel Paulina is a good woman and Paola planned the usurpation. Carlos Daniel tells Rodrigo another woman is in Paola's place.
episodes.title: Capítulo 31

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Barragan tells Paola and Carlos Daniel Carlitos's leg operation should take place in a week. Grandma Piedad thinks Paola's usurper has been found.
episodes.title: Capítulo 32

episodes.synopsis: Luciano accepts money to sign a document for Carlos Daniel and Rodrigo explaining how the usurpation occurred. Paulina tells Grandma Piedad the truth.
episodes.title: Capítulo 33

episodes.synopsis: Lalita gives Carlos Daniel Paola's diary. Grandma Piedad asks Carlos Daniel to find Paulina and get her to come back with them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 34

episodes.synopsis: Lalita and Fidelina tell Grandma Piedad they haven't found Carlitos. Douglas, upset, orders Braulio to find Paola, who didn't show up to eat with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 35

episodes.synopsis: Based on Carlos Daniel's reaction to her call, Paola thinks nobody knows about the usurpation. Mojarras tells Doña Chabela to find Carlitos's family.
episodes.title: Capítulo 36

episodes.synopsis: Chabela tells Carlitos she'll help him find his family because he shouldn't be poor. Carlos Daniel tells Paola Carlitos is at a boarding school.
episodes.title: Capítulo 37

episodes.synopsis: Douglas tells Braulio if it's necessary, he'll buy Paola's love. Braulio thinks Paola and Noelia are the same person.
episodes.title: Capítulo 38

episodes.synopsis: Lourdes is upset because Osvaldo is being too friendly with Paulina. Lalita tells Paola the Brachos know there was an usurpation and Carlitos is gone.
episodes.title: Capítulo 39

episodes.synopsis: Paulina warns Osvaldo if he disrespects her again, she'll tell Lourdes. Amador tells Commander Merino he'll get Lalita to fall in love with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 40

episodes.synopsis: Paulina tells Carlos Daniel Carlitos isn't with her. Douglas tells Paola they're going far away. Douglas tells Braulio to find out if Paola is Noelia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 41

episodes.synopsis: Zenobia advises Doña Chabela to ask for money to return Carlitos. Lalita confuses Paulina with Paola and asks if she's going on her trip.
episodes.title: Capítulo 42

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel thinks Paola is the one he kissed. Paola is surprised when Lalita asks if she left her car at Douglas's house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 43

episodes.synopsis: Patricia asks Rodrigo not to turn Paulina in. Doña Chabela tells Zenobia and Macrina she won't let them ask for money to return Carlitos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 44

episodes.synopsis: Douglas catches Larry and Paola kissing. Grandma Piedad tells Paulina Carlos Daniel is in love with her because she's a good woman.
episodes.title: Capítulo 45

episodes.synopsis: Paulina tells Carlos Daniel she won't run from the Brachos anymore. Grandma Piedad thinks Carlos Daniel should get a divorce and marry Paulina.
episodes.title: Capítulo 46

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel tells Amador Carlitos has returned. In Quintana Roo, Filomena cleans Paulina's house and finds a latter Paola wrote before she died.
episodes.title: Capítulo 47

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel tells Paulina he appreciates despite agreeing to take Paola's place, and won't marry Veronica unless she accepts Carlitos and Lissete.
episodes.title: Capítulo 48

episodes.synopsis: Carlitos asks Paulina and Carlos Daniel to take him to see Doña Chabela. The police arrest Zenobia and Mojarras by Commander Merino's order.
episodes.title: Capítulo 49

episodes.synopsis: Celia tells Amador it was Paola who made Paulina take her place. Grandma Piedad tells Rodrigo Paulina should go back to her position at the factory.
episodes.title: Capítulo 50

episodes.synopsis: Willy is upset to find out Paola tranquilized the workers. Willy asks Viviana to see him again. Leandro tells Paola he'll stay on as the foreman.
episodes.title: Capítulo 51

episodes.synopsis: Paulina asks Carlos Daniel to prove his love by letting Carlitos see Doña Chablea and Mojarras. Viviana tells Abigail she has a good suitor.
episodes.title: Capítulo 52

episodes.synopsis: Veronica tells Carlos Daniel Paulina sacrificed a lot for the Brachos. Paola invites Doña Chabela and Mojarras to spend a few days with Carlitos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 53

episodes.synopsis: Douglas tells Braulio to leave Paola in a clinic and he'll tell the Brachos to take care of the situation. Amador finds a letter to Paulina.
episodes.title: Capítulo 54

episodes.synopsis: Estefania threatens to kill Willy if he leaves her for another woman. Felipe tells Leandro he saw Viviana with Willy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 55

episodes.synopsis: Leandro tells Rodrigo Willy and Viviana are lovers. Veronica asks Leandro to be friends. Amador tells Commander Merino Paola confirmed what Gema said.
episodes.title: Capítulo 56

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel asks Paulina to get married as soon as he divorces. Willy and Viviana have sex in his car. Leandro tells Abigail he's done with Viviana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 57

episodes.synopsis: Paola tells Commander Merino she's not Paulina. Estefania catches Willy and Viviana. Grandma Piedad reads an anonymous letter to Carlos Daniel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 58

episodes.synopsis: Veronica tells Paulina over the phone that Estefania is in the hospital. Commander Merino tells Gema and Willy Paola is in Mexico.
episodes.title: Capítulo 59

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel tells Estefania he's in love with Paulina. Lalita slaps Amador when she finds out he's a police officer and they have Paulina.
episodes.title: Capítulo 60

episodes.synopsis: Commander Merino informs Montesinos that Paulina can't make bail. Gema tells Estefanía Paola is more dead than alive and Paulina is in prison.
episodes.title: Capítulo 61

episodes.synopsis: Lourdes gets upset when Osvaldo tells her that he will help Paulina. Montesinos informs Carlos Daniel that he will no longer defend Paulina.
episodes.title: Capítulo 62

episodes.synopsis: Gema tells Carlos Daniel that Serrano was hired by Paulina's accomplice. Fidelina asks Patricia to intervene on behalf of Estefanía.
episodes.title: Capítulo 63

episodes.synopsis: Douglas tells Braulio that he'll help Paulina because she's a good woman. Carlos tells Rodrigo that he will not help Paulina because she's a criminal.
episodes.title: Capítulo 64

episodes.synopsis: Felipe tells Leandro and Memo they should help Paulina. Paola tells Elvira she feigned illness in order to return to the Bracho home with dignity.
episodes.title: Capítulo 65

episodes.synopsis: Zenobia is sent to solitary confinement. Viviana faints in front of Abigail, and Leandro advises Abigail to take her to the doctor.
episodes.title: Capítulo 66

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo tells Verónica to take Estefanía's place at the factory. Carlos Daniel tells Gema that her plan to get him to think Paulina was guilty failed.
episodes.title: Capítulo 67

episodes.synopsis: Willy tells Estefanía they'll get divorced when he gets what's his. Grandma Piedad tells Carlitos that Paola is in prison, and he asks to visit her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 68

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel asks Paola to help Paulina because she's the love of his life. Dr. Galicia tells Carlos that he must have imagined Paola's reaction.
episodes.title: Capítulo 69

episodes.synopsis: Willy slaps Viviana and threatens her. Dr. Mendive tells Paulina Mr. Piña's fallen for her. Donato tells Félix he wants to testify at Paulina's trial.
episodes.title: Capítulo 70

episodes.synopsis: Paulina slaps Mr. Piña when he tries to kiss her, and he tells her she'll pay for it. Rodrigo tells Carlos Daniel he'll pay for Willy's bail.
episodes.title: Capítulo 71

episodes.synopsis: Serrano believes he's fallen in love with Paulina, and Estefanía tells Willy that if they get divorced he won't see a penny.
episodes.title: Capítulo 72

episodes.synopsis: Viviana tells Willy to stop looking for her. Zenobia returns home, and Willy asks Patricia to take care of Estefanía because he's leaving Mexico.
episodes.title: Capítulo 73

episodes.synopsis: Paulina gets upset when Serrano tells her the police have finished their investigation and that she'll be freed, even if Paola's affected by it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 74

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel offers Paola's diary as proof so she won't be able to testify against Paulina. Douglas asks Paulina to present evidence against Paola.
episodes.title: Capítulo 75

episodes.synopsis: Fidelina tells Estefanía she'll stay with her for a few days to care for her son. Dr. Galicia authorizes Paola's attendance at Paulina's trial.
episodes.title: Capítulo 76

episodes.synopsis: Leandro tells Abigail that if Viviana really loves him, he'll marry her. Doña Chabela, Mojarras and Zenobia thank Carlos for getting her out of jail.
episodes.title: Capítulo 77

episodes.synopsis: Leandro tells Abigail once he's married to Viviana he'll leave Mexico with the support of the Brachos. Gema asks Luciano to testify against Paulina.
episodes.title: Capítulo 78

episodes.synopsis: Paola accuses Paulina of having plotted to take her place and later faints before the jury so she won't have to answer  Serrano's questions.
episodes.title: Capítulo 79

episodes.synopsis: Luciano testifies that Paola planned the impersonation and forced Paulina to accept. Leandro tells Felipe and Memo that he's going to marry Viviana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 80

episodes.synopsis: Serrano and Luciano ask Filomena and Celia to state what they know about the impersonation in order to help Paulina.
episodes.title: Capítulo 81

episodes.synopsis: Paulina asks Paola not to return to the Bracho home. Filomena and Celia testify in favor of Paola, and Pedro testifies in favor of Paulina.
episodes.title: Capítulo 82

episodes.synopsis: Zapata tells Judge Castro he'll let the jury decide whether Paulina is guilty or not. Brígida tells Lourdes it's best that Osvaldo left.
episodes.title: Capítulo 83

episodes.synopsis: Willy gets upset when he hears that Paulina was declared innocent. Montesinos informs Paola there's no one left to testify against her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 84

episodes.synopsis: Paola tells Paulina that she will return to the Bracho home to get Carlos Daniel back. Carlos Daniel signs the divorce papers for Cabañas.
episodes.title: Capítulo 85

episodes.synopsis: Serrano tells Osvaldo that he's in love with Paulina. Grandma Piedad tells Paola everyone will shun her because she's earned their scorn.
episodes.title: Capítulo 86

episodes.synopsis: Carlos Daniel tells Paola that he will never forgive her. Willy tells Estefanía that he will return to the Bracho factory and take Leandro's place.
episodes.title: Capítulo 87

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo convinces Paulina to go back to the factory, and Elvira warns Paola that if she goes to the factory they may discover that she's not disabled.
episodes.title: Capítulo 88

episodes.synopsis: Willy hears Fidelina tell Piedad she doesn't have the courage to tell Estefanía that she's her mother. Carlos Daniel asks Paulina to leave Mexico.
episodes.title: Capítulo 89

episodes.synopsis: Paola and Gema fall out of grace with Carlos Daniel. Paulina turns down Serrano's marriage proposal, telling him she does not love him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 90

episodes.synopsis: Grandma Piedad is shocked when Carlos Daniel tells her that Paulina is to marry Serrano. At last, Paulina realizes how evil Paola really is.
episodes.title: Capítulo 91

episodes.synopsis: Veronica tells Paulina about Willy's aggression toward Carlos, and Eloina tells Paulina and Rodrigo that Carlos Daniel is in critical condition.
episodes.title: Capítulo 92

episodes.synopsis: Paola threatens to kill Lalita if she tells anyone she can walk. Paulina tells Serrano she can't think of him while the Brachos are in trouble.
episodes.title: Capítulo 93

episodes.synopsis: Mayo tells Paola she won't get much money in the divorce because the factory is bankrupt. Estefanía cries when she reads a letter from Willy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 94

episodes.synopsis: Patricia advises Estefanía not to give Willy any money. Paulina suggests that Carlos Daniel find another woman since they weren't meant to be.
episodes.title: Capítulo 95

episodes.synopsis: Isabel tells Carlos Daniel to wait until he's sure about his feelings. Paola offers Willy money in exchange for helping her destroy the Brachos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 96

episodes.synopsis: Grandma Piedad tells Rodrigo that Paola lied and was never paralysed. Carlos Daniel asks Gema not to tell Paulina about his relationship with Isabel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 97

episodes.synopsis: Isabel tells Carlos that she's leaving because he's in love with Paulina. Two men approach a burning truck and find Elvira dead and Paola unconscious.
episodes.title: Capítulo 98

episodes.synopsis: Willy offers Mauricio money in exchange for setting fire to the Bracho factory. Paola asks Paulina to be happy with Carlos Daniel after she's dead.
episodes.title: Capítulo 99

episodes.synopsis: Grandma Piedad tells Paulina that Paola's wake will be at the Bracho home. Estefanía asks Rodrigo for what's hers in order not to lose Willy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 100

episodes.synopsis: Estefanía gives Willy the money, and he gives her the child. Paulina tells Carlos she will marry Serrano, and Willy prepares to burn the factory down.
episodes.title: Capítulo 101

episodes.synopsis: Fidelina tells Grandma Piedad that Estefanía is to be committed to a mental hospital. Carlos Daniel and Paulina are married. The end.
episodes.title: Capítulo 102
